title: Live reload with multi-module workspace containing SNAPSHOT dependencies
body:
### Describe the bug

When developing a multi-module `Quarkus` application with `SNAPSHOT` modules, the live-reload functionality does not register any modules which are deployed to a maven repository (e.g. Sonatype Nexus).
These modules can be used in other applications and therefore have to be deployed to a maven repository (we use a self-hosted instance of Sonatype Nexus).

### Expected behavior

The live reload functionality should work in a multi-module project regardless if it is deployed to a maven repository or not.

### Actual behavior

Live reload of `SNAPSHOT`-versioned modules which were uploaded to a maven repository does not work.
It actually works, if you `mvn install` these modules.

### How to Reproduce?

Reproducer with detailed instructions and information: https://github.com/rokkolesa/quarkus-live-reload-problem.
